name: Zeke's Convergence
simpleDescription: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.

passives.name: Frostfire Tempest
passives.effects: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you summon a storm of flame and ice around you for 5 seconds, dealing 7.5 magic damage every 0.25s seconds (150 total magic damage over the duration)to enemies within icononly=true 350 units and slowing them by 30% (45 second cooldown, starts on ultimate cast).
